parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

parameters.name: JobCode
parameters.description:
The task code that specifies the type of the DTS subtask. Valid values:

*   **01**: precheck
*   **02**: schema migration or initial schema synchronization
*   **03**: full data migration or initial full data synchronization
*   **04**: incremental data migration or synchronization

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The filter item used to filter tables in fuzzy match.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0** and does not exceed the maximum value of the Integer data type. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the DTS instance. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: StructPhase
parameters.description: The filter item used to filter tables, views, and functions during schema migration.

parameters.name: StructType
parameters.description:
The type of schema definition. Valid values:

*   **before**: schema migration or initial schema synchronization
*   **after**: DDL operations performed during incremental data migration or synchronization
